name: Cascade! A book of poems by James Wylder
blurb: Help create a print version of James Wylder's poetry (author of the play "Cryptos", and featured in Kennings Literary Magazine).

name: Dismantle / Rebuild - A Poetry Collection
blurb: Dismantle / Rebuild is the first printed collection of prose and poetry written by Tim Scotson.

name: 'Unspecified', a poetry book hoping for a print edition
blurb: South African poet Yoshira Marbel's depression, heartbreak, emptiness, anger, and suffering will soon be in print, if you pledge now.

name: An £8 Poem
blurb: On the 8th of the 8th at 8pm I will be writing and releasing my 4th poem in what has now become a sequence. I want £8.

name: A £13 Poem
blurb: A man walks into a bar. That's how it starts. £13 and he'll tell you what happened after he walked out.

name: A £5 Poem
blurb: So I wrote a poem. So I rewrote it. So I rewrote it again. Then I read it. It was depressing. So I thought I'd write another one.

name: she&i (a poetic journey of self and soul)
blurb: "she&i" is a series of poems exploring the relationship between self & soul, an empowered journey of listening to who I really am.

name: Twenty-One: Help me publish my first book!
blurb:
For a long time, I dreamed of publishing a book in my 21st year.
I have about five months left of being 21, so here I am!

name: Poetry Book - French Kissing God: A Journey to Enlightenment
blurb: A critically acclaimed poetry book that guides you on a journey to find love, life, self and divine connection.

name: A £1 Poem
blurb: This is about going back to the beginning. Or before the beginning began. I wanted to ask for nothing but I can't so I'm asking for £1.

name: Paper Dreams
blurb: Paper Dreams is a collection of writings ranging from poetry to prose to playwright. I started four years ago--it's time to publish.

name: This is For You: A Chapbook of Gender-Free Love Poetry
blurb: The first completely inclusive collection of love poetry for all lovers, regardless of gender.

name: "A God's Life" And "Courting Hunger" - Two Stories In Poems
blurb: In these two books, an exiled spy god and a human deal with their addiction to loving doomed mortals.

name: The Lost Poems of Pablo Neruda
blurb: Help Copper Canyon Press publish a beautiful collection of previously undiscovered poems by Pablo Neruda

name: A £3 Poem
blurb: I'm embarking on the notoriously difficult 3rd poem. 3 drafts in 3 days. The 3rd draft will be published on the 3rd day. I want £3.

name: An Eloquence of Time and Space: A Doctor Who 50th Poem Book
blurb: An episode guide for Doctor Who-- as poetry! Every episode of Series 1-7 will have its own poem to celebrate Who's 50th anniversary.

name: The Clean Poetry Series
blurb: Clean Closet—the first of three books in The Clean Poetry Series—is complete! This Online Book Signing raises funds for the audiobook.

name: The $1 Poem Project
blurb: For $1, You choose the topic, I write the poem & mail it straight to You.

name: Turtledove Press Presents Annie Diamond
blurb: Turtledove Press publishes new poems by poet Annie Diamond

name: Rambles, for poetic wanderers
blurb: A budding poet joins forces with creative team to produce a stunning book of photos and poems that celebrate mystery, wonder & life.

name: A Book of Poetry by Beverly Jarosz: Unfulfilled
blurb: Beverly Jarosz dreamed of one day publishing her poetry, but in 1964 an unknown killer took her voice away. Now we are returning it.

name: Candescent Poetry Launch
blurb: It's a simple project, really: a small-volume book of poems, written straight from my dangerously imaginative heart. Dare to blaze.

name: Make 100 Love Poems By Valentine's Day
blurb: $1 gets you a personalized love poem that will be written and sent to you by February 14th. Come Spread the Love

name: Paperscape: A Poetry Book
blurb: Paper-themed poetry book. Approx. 60 pages. Full colour illustrations. Whimsical, rhyming, meaningful. + bonus book of 2nd rate poetry

name: Tongues in Trees Book Tour
blurb: Celebrate 25 years of eco-feminist poetry by Cassie Premo Steele and help the Tongues in Trees book tour come to you!

name: Full Moon: Poetry & Illustration by Rebecca Baruc
blurb: A heartache led to writing poetry. A fight on a bus leads to printing booklets to share with all of Chicago

name: New Jewish poetry from Ben Yehuda Press for 5778
blurb: We want to publish six books of new Jewish poetry in the coming year. Our authors include two Pushcart nominees.

name: Make 100: A Fearless Chapbook of Erasure Poetry
blurb: A 40-page, full color chapbook of erasure poetry.

name: Indolent Books 2018 List
blurb: 12 new books of poetry; underrepresented voices; innovative, provocative & risky poetry about racial, social & economic justice issues

name: Unraveling Light
blurb: An uplifting debut collection of poetry.

name: Poetry.Community - Where Writers Unite!
blurb: A social network for poets and readers of poetry.

name: Is Choosing a Goat Like Choosing a Dog? Poetry Chapbook
blurb: Is Choosing a Goat Like Choosing a Dog? is a 24 page poetry chapbook with 16 poems and 7 pages of hand drawn pencil illustrations.

name: Fallen Sky, Bought and Sold - a New Poetry Collection
blurb: The newest offering from David Greshel based on Instagram Writing Prompt Challenges

name: poetry book: america is a dry cookie and other love stories
blurb: We live in interesting times. You can help publish this book that confronts these times with poetry and laughter.

name: Lucky Penny Press
blurb: Short poems published on pressed pennies. (Lea's Quick Pitch #1)

name: Dancing in the Dark - an artist's book
blurb: A 21st-century Hero's Journey told in a richly painted 48-page story poem

name: self/ser: poems on queer and trans existence and love
blurb: self/ser is a poetic-photographic, ancestral-spiritual exploration of queer and trans existence and love.

name: Hi Angels Deluxe edition + book tour
blurb: A deluxe edition of Hi Angels: Poems by Candystore with artwork by Jerome Caja for the LA Art Book Fair and mini West Coast book tour

name: The journey of my first book "Finding me"
blurb: Poetry

name: Fragile Goods - An LGBT Poetry Collection
blurb: A prospective collection of poems about love, pain and beauty--using my underrepresented perspective as a gay POC to diversify poetry

name: Mavros: Blackout Poetry Stencil
blurb: A stencil which seeks to elevate the experience of blackout poetry

name: This Map is Just a Suggestion | A 15 Year Poet Retrospective
blurb: The Selected Works of the Publishing Goblin and New Releases

name: Help Yin Xzi Publish 'Home is Here'!
blurb: Yin Xzi needs support in self-publishing her memoir, 'Home is Here'!

name: Different Just Like Everyone Else
blurb: Liam Fleming's second poetry anthology. Over 120 poems featuring a variety of topics.

name: My Pocket of Fears
blurb: "On Love, Depression, and Other Mental Disorders" - A collection of poems and short stories written by Jonathan C. Ashline.

name: Anti/Muse: A Collection of Poetry & Art
blurb: A journey of self-healing & resilience through poetry and art.

name: THE BEAUTIFUL: Poets Reimagine a Nation
blurb: THE BEAUTIFUL features the nation's foremost poets and revolutionizes our ideas of beauty and belonging.

name: American Bug
blurb: A second book of poetry from Nick Ulanowski. If the system has held you down or made you feel worthless, this is dedicated to you.

name: TNTRK- a tantric journey through poetry and art
blurb: A book of tantric poetry and art created in the Snoqualmie Valley, Washington

name: Illustrated business poetry
blurb: Inspired by your typical, everyday workplace dilemmas. The ideal workplace gift. Goofy, satirical business picture books.

name: A Promenade at Home
blurb: A book of poetry by Sevinç Çalhanoğlu about a childhood home and the memories it contains.

name: Riot of Roses
blurb: Riot of Roses is the debut collection of poetry by Brenda Vaca

name: Wild Poet: A Small Poetry Collection
blurb: My debut collection of poems, curated from several years of writing through emotions and experiences.

name: Serpentine
blurb: A book of poems by Tara K. Shepersky with illustrations by Lucy Bellwood

name: A Month of Someday: Poems by Gerald Wagoner
blurb: The debut chapbook by Brooklyn poet Gerald Wagoner explores the early pandemic lockdown in a poem for every day of April 2020.

name: "Insatiable Desires Written in Blood" | Dark & Occult Poetry
blurb: When your inner Witch, Vampire & Fallen Angel dance together in a schizophrenic spinning of death, romance & nostalgia -Soror Vanarotha

name: Birdsong: A Melody for Motherhood
blurb: A rhyming and hand-painted gift book for Mothers.

name: Spiritbox: A Book of Meme Poetry from Katie Haegele
blurb: The pieces in this book are by turns wishes, affirmations, short stories, confessions, etymologies, therapies, and poems.

name: The Grimoire of Forgotten Fairytales
blurb: Unearthing the Shadows of Ancient Lore: A Sinister Collection of Forgotten Rhymes, Folklore and Fae

name: Demanding the Room
blurb: A collection of poems by Dylan Angell, illustrated by Mark He

name: Awake, My Soul
blurb: A book of daily readings of 366 hymn texts from throughout church history, elegantly typeset and cloth bound.

name: Unnailing The Coffin Of My Life
blurb: Apollo Vulcan Mars Brings you, "Unnailing the Coffin of my Life" a book with over 100 poems that guides you through his life.
